perturbation.original_text: Horst Entertainment agrees to pay Galactcomm $0.01 (one cent) per access up to 400,000 accesses thereafter payment shall be $0.005 (one-half cent) per access. Horst Entertainment shall send this amount to Galacticomm by no later than Wednesday for accesses used from the previuos week (Monday thru Sunday).
perturbation.changed_text: Horst Entertainment agrees to pay Galactcomm $0.01 (one cent) per access up to 400,000 accesses thereafter payment shall be $0.005 (one-half cent) per access. Payment terms are subject to change at Galacticomm's discretion. Horst Entertainment shall send this amount to Galacticomm by no later than Wednesday for accesses used from the previuos week (Monday thru Sunday).
perturbation.explanation: By adding 'Payment terms are subject to change at Galacticomm's discretion,' the contract contradicts the initial agreement on payment amounts. This introduces uncertainty and potential disputes, as the legally defined payment terms can now be unilaterally altered, conflicting with contract law principles requiring mutual agreement.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Requirement of Mutual Agreement

perturbation.original_text: Galacticomm must provide a person(s) to correct any technical problems (Server being down or inaccessible) 24 hours per day, 7 days per week. This person(s) must be available by beeper or telephone. Horst Entertainment shall provide this same 24 hour service at the broadcast location.
perturbation.changed_text: Galacticomm must provide a person(s) to correct any technical problems (Server being down or inaccessible) during normal business hours. After-hours support is available on a best-effort basis. This person(s) must be available by beeper or telephone during business hours. Horst Entertainment shall provide this same 24 hour service at the broadcast location.
perturbation.explanation: The change from '24 hours per day, 7 days per week' to 'during normal business hours' creates a contradiction. The original clause implies a legally enforceable commitment to 24/7 support, while the modified clause limits this obligation and introduces ambiguity, making enforcement uncertain. This contradicts the initial commitment to consistent service.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Duty of Care and Performance

perturbation.original_text: All parties have read and fully agree to all terms and conditions as set forth in this Web Hosting Agreement. Any disputes arising herein shall be settled in a court in FLorida.
perturbation.changed_text: All parties have read and agree to the majority of the terms and conditions. Any disputes arising herein will be subject to mediation before proceeding to any court with venue selected by Galacticomm.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'fully agree to all terms' to 'agree to the majority of the terms' introduces ambiguity regarding the enforceable aspects of the agreement. Specifying 'venue selected by Galacticomm' contradicts standard legal principles of fair venue selection, potentially biasing dispute resolution. The location of mediation and its effects are left open to change at Galacticomm's discretion.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Mutuality of Obligation; Principles of Fair Venue
